channel.title: Strength Level Req
channel.description:
In my ItemAssistant.java Any weapon, armour, etc. requiring a certain (strengthLevelReq) code is nulled. For example, I have:
case 6528: c.strengthLevelReq = 60;
So, to equip item 6528, Tzhaar-Ket-Om (obby maul), I would need 60 strength. But for some reason, I can equip it with 1 strength. The same goes for any other weapon/armour requiring strength. Such as my void, you only need 42 attack, defence, range, and magic. And barrows weapons, you only need 70 attack.
Any advice on where to make it so if it requires strength levels..it makes it require strength levels!

item.title: Strength Level Req
item.dc:creator: @zxx75 zxx75
item.description:
@zxx75 wrote:

maybe try to go to config and you see a list like this:

public static final boolean itemRequirements = true; // attack, def, str, range or magic levels required to wield weapons or wear items?

if the true = false
change if to true.
hope this help:)
if this is the problem…

Read full topic

In my ItemAssistant.java
Any weapon, armour, etc. requiring a certain (strengthLevelReq) code is nulled.

c.strengthLevelReq = 60;

So, to equip item 6528, Tzhaar-Ket-Om (obby maul), I would need 60 strength.
But for some reason, I can equip it with 1 strength.
The same goes for any other weapon/armour requiring strength.
Such as my void, you only need 42 attack, defence, range, and magic.
And barrows weapons, you only need 70 attack.

Any advice on where to make it so if it requires strength levels…it makes it require strength levels!
